task.title: Using Configuration and Administration Forms
task.shortdesc: This task outlines how to enable the Fast Response Cache Accelerator (FRCA) through the HTTP Server's user interface.

taskbody.context: Using the Configuration and Administration Forms provides a user-friendly way to enable FRCA without manually editing configuration files. This task guides you through the process of navigating the server interface, enabling the feature, and ensuring the settings take effect.

step.cmd: Navigate to the HTTP Server's administration page.
Click on Configuration and Administration Forms.
Enable FRCA by clicking Enable Fast Response Cache Accelerator.
Configure additional FRCA settings as needed, matching the options available in the httpd.conf file.
Restart the HTTP Server to apply the settings.
